p: Subsequently, a revised IAP‐DGVM1.0 introduced the effects of soil moisture during the growing season on the establishment rate of woody plant functional types (PFTs) in the establishment scheme (Song, Zeng, Zhu, & Shao, 2016). When coupled with CLM3, compared with the default IAP‐DGVM1.0, the revised version reduced biases in forest fractional coverage in approximately 78.8% of the global grid cells, especially in arid and semiarid regions and the transition zones of forests (Song et al., 2016). In this work, the revised IAP‐DGVM1.0 coupled with CLM3 is used and abbreviated as IAP‐DGVM in the following sections.
